title: Gay Couples Wedding: How to Choose WeddingRings
text:
wedding rings google 
In many countries, homosexuality is considered taboo, or even illegal. In the United States however, recent laws have been passed that allow homosexual men and women to wed. This marks a great time in American history, but also a new challenge for gay men and women. While it's easy to find gay women engagement& wedding ring, it's difficult to find many designers who work especially with gay male couples.How do you choose the perfect wedding ring as gay male couple? 
Wedding Ring Etiquette: Choosing the Perfect Ring 
When two men get married, are matching rings considered proper? Do you need to purchase an engagement ring, as well as a wedding band? Here are a few tips on gay wedding ring etiquette: 
1. Traditional couples choose matching wedding sets, so why not gay men as well? If you and your partner can agree on a ring design, great. If not, don’t worry so much. Even if your rings don’t match they will still be a symbol of your love for each other. 
2. Remember to include your partner in the search for a wedding band. It is a good idea to browse online before you hit the jewelry store, so you have a better idea of what you are looking for. Also, don’t forget that you can order online if you find a band that you absolutely love! 
3. Finally, consider if you want both an engagement ring and a wedding band. For a lot of gay men, this is a whole new area of confusion. Engagement rings are traditionally designed for women, meaning they have more feminine designs. If you find that having both pieces of jewelry is important to you and your partner, go ahead and splurge. Otherwise, stick to purchasing a single wedding band for each of you. 
Gay couples may find designing a custom wedding ring is a good answer to obtain the perfect wedding ring. They offer selection of gay couple’s engagement/wedding rings such as Doron Merav Jewelry especially with the BNG collection. 
Wedding Ring Materials 
When you go to look at rings, one of the things you really should consider is the material the ring will be made out of. This should depend on your price range, as well as the amount you are looking to spend. Some materials to consider include:
